# "Metabolic capabilities are highly conserved among human nasal-associated *Corynebacterium* species" Supplemental Methods

## This repository includes:

-   Supplemental methods for program [installations](SupplementalMethods_Installations.html). 

-   Supplemental methods and output files for quality control and MASH analysis executed with [PanACoTA](SupplementalMethods_GENOMES.html).

-   Supplemental methods and output files for [Prokka v1.14.6 annotation](SupplementalMethods_Annotations.html) of 107 *Corynebacterium* strain genomes.

-   Supplemental methods and output files of pangenome analyses performed with [GET_HOMOLOGUES](SupplementalMethods_GET_HOMOLOGUES.html).

-   Supplemental methods and output files for the [anvi'o v7 pangenomic and metabolic analysis](SupplementalMethods_Anvio.html).

-   Supplemental methods and output files of COG anvi'o annotated gene clusters assignments to the persistent versus accessory genome with [PPanGGOLiN analysis](SupplementalMethods_PPanGGOLiN.html).

-   Supplemental methods and output files for [COG annotations and funtional enrichment analysis](SupplementalMethods_COGS.html).
